title: The Essential Guide to Self-Sufficiency: Cultivating Your Survival Garden"**

tasks.task: Urban Gardening Vegetable Harvesting and Plant Care
subtasks: Identifying ripe leaves for harvesting from Siberian kale plants
Using scissors or shears to remove large lower leaves from the kale base
Collecting harvested leaves for cleaning and preservation
Removing yellow or diseased leaves from the kale base and adding to compost
Leaving three to four upper leaves on the kale plant to encourage new growth
Replicating leaf harvesting process for dinosaur kale plants
Identifying and removing bottom leaves from red leaf lettuce plants
Leaving sufficient foliage on lettuce plants to promote continued growth
Soaking harvested leafy greens in vinegar solution to disinfect before use
Collecting kale and spinach leaves after vinegar soak
Preparing bags for frozen storage of harvested greens
Storing frozen greens for year-round availability
